example.eg: The army disguised the soldiers as ordinary villagers.
example.egtrans: 部队将士兵伪装成普通村民。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 将…假扮成，将…装扮成，将…伪装成

example.eg: The con man disguised his true intentions.
example.egtrans: 那个骗子隐瞒了自己的真实意图。

example.eg: Carol's disguise was so good that no one recognized her at all.
example.egtrans: 卡罗尔的伪装很完美，没人认得出她来。

example.eg: The jewel thief was a master of disguise.
example.egtrans: 那个珠宝大盗是位乔装大师。

example.eg: Not being chosen to play that role turned out to be a blessing in disguise.
They infiltrated the enemy's headquarters in disguise.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 伪装地, 乔装地, 假扮地
化装的, 伪装的, 伪装的
